summary: In the summer of 1983, just days before the birth of his first son, writer and theologian John Hull went blind. In order to make sense of the upheaval in his life, he began keeping a diary ... See full summary »
cast: John M. Hull|Marilyn Hull|Miranda Beinart-Smith|Jamie Bradley|Eileen Davies|Tim Gebbels|Simone Kirby|Mahalia Martin-Jones|Dan Renton Skinner|Sidney Warbrick|Stanley Warbrick|Lorelei Winterfrost
title: Contemplación
